text:
"Coming 2 America" is an upcoming American comedy movie. It is a sequel to "Coming to America" (1988). The movie is directed by Craig Brewer, from a screenplay by David Sheffield, Barry W. Blaustein, and Kenya Barris. It is based on characters created by Eddie Murphy.
The movie stars Eddie Murphy, Arsenio Hall, Jermaine Fowler, Leslie Jones, Shari Headley, John Amos, Tracy Morgan, Wesley Snipes, and James Earl Jones.
The movie is scheduled to be released on December 18, 2020 in the United States.
